full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 745 Filed 08/10/22 Page 179 of 264 590 LC1VMAX5 Jane - cross 1 A. Yes. 2 Q. And you recently commemorated 20 -- 3 A. -- something years, yes. 4 Q. Twenty-something years on that show. 5 A. A soap opera is characterized by tangled interpersonal 6 situations, fair enough? 7 A. It's a very eloquent way to put it, I guess. 8 Q. And melodramatic are sentimental treatment of those 9 interpersonal situations, right? 10 A. Hopefully, not melodramatic, just dramatic. 11 Q. Your character has been involved in a number of different 12 plot lines over those 20-something years, fair? 13 A. Naturally, yes. 14 Q. You've played a protective mom? 15 A. Yes. 16 Q. You've been bullied? 17 A. Yes. 18 Q. You've battled cancer? 19 A. Yes. 20 Q. You've played a car crash victim? 21 A. I forgot about that one, but yes. 22 Q. Mental health issues? 23 A. Yes. 24 Q. You've been stalked by serial killers? 25 A. Yes. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012199
